sentences.sContent: an almost entirely avoidable cause of death
sentences.sCn: 几乎可以完全避免的死因

sentences.sContent: Nearly 1,000 children die each year from accidents in the home which are avoidable.
sentences.sCn: 每年有近1,000名儿童死于可避免的家庭事故。

synos.tran: 可避免的；可作为无效的；可回避的

trans.tranOther: something bad that is avoidable can be avoided or prevented
